Transcription for 546181

Tena, wellï¿½l confidently,
Fl Keeping calm
O God, I'm willing to die.
He who hath made me blind,
hath done to me a lie,
O God, I'm willing to die.
Death to the royal,
sin to the royal,
for the bread,
for the peace of the hill.
Dehav'let the prayer,
of the rich and rare,
of the lowly bread.
